languages.text: {n}Бросив последний взгляд на мертвецов, Джай тихо добавляет:{/n} "И чтобы между нами не было недопонимания... Они умерли из-за твоей гордыни и нежелания хранить осторожность. Наверное, Вольному Торговцу простительно не тревожиться о жизнях каких-то жалких контрабандистов... Но эти контрабандисты были моей семьей. И их души не простят мне, если я продолжу спать с {mf|тем|той}, кто обрек{mf||ла} их на смерть. Да и я бы не простила себе такого".

{n}Jae casts one last look at the bodies and adds quietly,{/n} "And just so we're clear... They died because of your pride and unwillingness to act cautiously. I could see why a Rogue Trader wouldn't care about the lives of some wretched smuggler gang... but these smugglers were my family. And their souls won't forgive me if I keep sleeping with the one who condemned them to death. I wouldn't forgive myself either."
languages.original_text: {n}Бросив последний взгляд на мертвецов, Джай тихо добавляет:{/n} "И чтобы между нами не было недопонимания... Они умерли из-за твоей гордыни и нежелания хранить осторожность. Наверное, Вольному Торговцу простительно не тревожиться о жизнях каких-то жалких контрабандистов... Но эти контрабандисты были моей семьей. И их души не простят мне, если я продолжу спать с {mf|тем|той}, кто обрек{mf||ла} их на смерть. Да и я бы не простила себе такого".

languages.text: {n}Jae lance un dernier regard aux cadavres et ajoute, la voix basse :{/n} « Et que ce soit bien clair... C'est votre orgueil qui a tué ces gens, ainsi que votre manque total de considération pour la plus élémentaire des prudences. Je peux comprendre {mf|qu'un libre-marchand|qu'une libre-marchande} accorde peu d'importance à la vie d'une bande de hors-la-loi... mais ces contrebandiers étaient ma famille. Je ne peux continuer de convoler avec {mf|celui|celle} qui les a condamnés à mort, ils ne me le pardonneraient jamais. Et je ne me le pardonnerais jamais à moi-même. »
languages.original_text: {n}Jae casts one last look at the bodies and adds quietly,{/n} "And just so we're clear... They died because of your pride and unwillingness to act cautiously. I could see why a Rogue Trader wouldn't care about the lives of some wretched smuggler gang... but these smugglers were my family. And their souls won't forgive me if I keep sleeping with the one who condemned them to death. I wouldn't forgive myself either."

C'est votre orgueil qui a tué ces gens, ainsi que votre manque total de considération pour la plus élémentaire des prudences. Je peux comprendre {mf|qu'un libre-marchand|qu'une libre-marchande} accorde peu d'importance à la vie d'une bande de hors-la-loi... mais ces contrebandiers étaient ma famille. Je ne peux continuer de convoler avec {mf|celui|celle} qui les a condamnés à mort, ils ne me le pardonneraient jamais. Et je ne me le pardonnerais jamais à moi-même. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}ジェイは最後に遺体を見つめ、静かにこう付け加えた。{/n}「はっきり言っておくけど…彼らはあんたのプライドと用心深い行動のせいで死んだのよ。自由開拓者が哀れな密輸業者の一団の命を気にしない理由は理解できたわ…だけど密輸業者たちはあたしの家族だった。もしこのまま彼らに死刑を宣告したヤツと寝続けたら、彼らの魂はあたしを許さないでしょうね。あたし自身も自分を許せないわ」
languages.original_text: {n}Jae casts one last look at the bodies and adds quietly,{/n} "And just so we're clear... They died because of your pride and unwillingness to act cautiously. I could see why a Rogue Trader wouldn't care about the lives of some wretched smuggler gang... but these smugglers were my family. And their souls won't forgive me if I keep sleeping with the one who condemned them to death. I wouldn't forgive myself either."

traits.locale_text: {n}ジェイは最後に遺体を見つめ、静かにこう付け加えた。{/n}「はっきり言っておくけど…彼らはあんたのプライドと用心深い行動のせいで死んだのよ。自由開拓者が哀れな密輸業者の一団の命を気にしない理由は理解できたわ…だけど密輸業者たちはあたしの家族だった。もしこのまま彼らに死刑を宣告したヤツと寝続けたら、彼らの魂はあたしを許さないでしょうね。あたし自身も自分を許せないわ」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}婕伊最后看了一眼地上的尸体，平静地补充道。{/n}“有件事情我想和你说清楚……他们之所以会死，都是因为你过于傲慢，不肯谨慎行事。行商浪人不会在乎一群卑鄙的走私犯，这我能理解……但这些走私犯都是我的家人。如果我继续和亲手判了他们死刑的人上床，他们的灵魂肯定不会原谅我，我也不会原谅我自己。”
languages.original_text: {n}Jae casts one last look at the bodies and adds quietly,{/n} "And just so we're clear... They died because of your pride and unwillingness to act cautiously. I could see why a Rogue Trader wouldn't care about the lives of some wretched smuggler gang... but these smugglers were my family. And their souls won't forgive me if I keep sleeping with the one who condemned them to death. I wouldn't forgive myself either."

traits.locale_text: {n}婕伊最后看了一眼地上的尸体，平静地补充道。{/n}“有件事情我想和你说清楚……他们之所以会死，都是因为你过于傲慢，不肯谨慎行事。行商浪人不会在乎一群卑鄙的走私犯，这我能理解……但这些走私犯都是我的家人。如果我继续和亲手判了他们死刑的人上床，他们的灵魂肯定不会原谅我，我也不会原谅我自己。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae wirft einen letzten Blick auf die Leichen und fügt leise hinzu:{/n} "Und nur, damit das klar ist ... Sie sind wegen ihres Stolzes und ihrer mangelnden Vorsicht gestorben. Ich kann verstehen, wenn {mf|ein Freihändler|eine Freihändlerin} sich nicht um die Leben irgendeiner dreckigen Schmugglerbande schert ... aber diese Schmuggler waren meine Familie. Und ihre Seelen werden es mir nicht verzeihen, wenn ich weiterhin mit {mf|dem Mann schlafe, der|der Frau schlafe, die} sie zum Tod verurteilt hat. Ich würde mir selbst auch nicht verzeihen."
languages.original_text: {n}Jae casts one last look at the bodies and adds quietly,{/n} "And just so we're clear... They died because of your pride and unwillingness to act cautiously. I could see why a Rogue Trader wouldn't care about the lives of some wretched smuggler gang... but these smugglers were my family. And their souls won't forgive me if I keep sleeping with the one who condemned them to death. I wouldn't forgive myself either."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae wirft einen letzten Blick auf die Leichen und fügt leise hinzu:{/n} "Und nur, damit das klar ist ... Sie sind wegen ihres Stolzes und ihrer mangelnden Vorsicht gestorben. Ich kann verstehen, wenn {mf|ein Freihändler|eine Freihändlerin} sich nicht um die Leben irgendeiner dreckigen Schmugglerbande schert ... aber diese Schmuggler waren meine Familie. Und ihre Seelen werden es mir nicht verzeihen, wenn ich weiterhin mit {mf|dem Mann schlafe, der|der Frau schlafe, die} sie zum Tod verurteilt hat. Ich würde mir selbst auch nicht verzeihen."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae mira por última vez los cadáveres y añade en voz baja:{/n} «Y, para que quede claro... han muerto por su orgullo y porque no ha querido actuar con cautela. Entiendo que a un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente no le importen las vidas de una banda de contrabandistas desharrapados... pero eran mi familia. Y sus almas no me perdonarían si siguiera acostándome con la persona que los ha condenado a muerte. Ni yo me lo perdonaría».
languages.original_text: {n}Jae casts one last look at the bodies and adds quietly,{/n} "And just so we're clear... They died because of your pride and unwillingness to act cautiously. I could see why a Rogue Trader wouldn't care about the lives of some wretched smuggler gang... but these smugglers were my family. And their souls won't forgive me if I keep sleeping with the one who condemned them to death. I wouldn't forgive myself either."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae mira por última vez los cadáveres y añade en voz baja:{/n} «Y, para que quede claro... han muerto por su orgullo y porque no ha querido actuar con cautela. Entiendo que a un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente no le importen las vidas de una banda de contrabandistas desharrapados... pero eran mi familia. Y sus almas no me perdonarían si siguiera acostándome con la persona que los ha condenado a muerte. Ni yo me lo perdonaría».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae, cesetlere son bir bakış atıp sessizce ekliyor.{/n} "Şunu da bil... Senin gururun, fevri davranışların yüzünden öldüler. Hür Tacir'in ne idiği belirsiz kaçakçıları harcamasını anlarım... Ama bu kaçakçılar benim ailemdi. Onları ölüme mahkûm edenle yatmaya devam etsem beni asla bağışlamazlar. Ben de kendimi bağışlamam zaten."
languages.original_text: {n}Jae casts one last look at the bodies and adds quietly,{/n} "And just so we're clear... They died because of your pride and unwillingness to act cautiously. I could see why a Rogue Trader wouldn't care about the lives of some wretched smuggler gang... but these smugglers were my family. And their souls won't forgive me if I keep sleeping with the one who condemned them to death. I wouldn't forgive myself either."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae, cesetlere son bir bakış atıp sessizce ekliyor,{/n} "Şunu da bil... Senin gururun, fevri davranışların yüzünden öldüler. Hür Tacir'in ne idüğü belirsiz kaçakçıları harcamasını anlarım... Ama bu kaçakçılar, benim ailemdi. Onları ölüme mahkûm edenle yatmaya devam etsem beni asla bağışlamazlar. Ben de bağışlamam."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
